wikitext.*:
'''Kingdoms of Arda''' is a Singleplayer & Multiplayer total conversion of ''Mount & Blade II Bannerlord'', that brings the world of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] into the game. This includes: characters, locations, weapons etc. from [[The Lord of the Rings]], [[The Hobbit]], [[The Silmarillion]] and other works by Tolkien and media made for his universe. The visuals is mainly inspired by [[Peter Jackson]]'s film adaptations. 

In December 2020 the mod won the award 'Players Choice – Best Upcoming Mod 2020' on Moddb.<ref>https://www.moddb.com/mods/a-lord-of-the-rings-mod-kingdoms-of-arda/features/players-choice-best-upcoming-mod-2020</ref> 

As of August 2023 the mod is still in development, with regular updates on Discord and Moddb along with YouTube videos created by team-members.
